project_stories.name: Cargo Web
project_stories.elevator_pitch: Migrated a tightly coupled desktop workflow into a web platform with explicit API boundaries used in production nationwide.
project_stories.problem: Legacy EXE client and direct DB dependency created opaque behavior and constrained scaling/debugging.
actions: Defined API-first boundaries between client and backend
Rebuilt execution flows in web client

project_stories.name: Platform Consolidation
project_stories.elevator_pitch: Consolidated website builder, booking, payments, and mobile delivery into a reusable architecture.
project_stories.problem: Fragmented implementations caused high duplication and costly maintenance/release cycles.
actions: Used RN WebView wrapper model to avoid per-client native duplication
outcomes: Long-lived architecture with low ongoing maintenance

project_stories.name: AWTAR / KSRTC
project_stories.elevator_pitch: Met a fixed government deadline by choosing a pragmatic cross-platform delivery strategy.
project_stories.problem: Late iOS requirement threatened committed timeline.
actions: Selected React Native WebView wrapper approach over full native rebuild
Prioritized contractual scope and delivery risk
outcomes: Delivered Android + iOS in one week
